name: High Seas Trader (itch)
description:
Note from the developer:

EVERYONE was COMPLAINING that my bitsy 4x FANTASY ECONOMY SIMULATOR didn't have enough STORY in it(??) so I made this new version for you with an EPIC quest OK

___________________________________________________________________________

High Seas Trader: Fantasy Economy Simulator is a nautical 4X game featuring:

  • Open world exploration
  • Deep simulation of dynamic fantasy economy
  • Numerous interdependent markets
  • Ruthless negotiation AI
  • Networked rumor system
  • Original art

Hero's Journey Redux Edition, now updated with:

  • Charming character-based storytelling
  • Compelling call-to-action climate crisis allegory
  • Episodic release schedule

___________________________________________________________________________

Created using:

  • Bitsy game maker
  • Bitsy Color custom editor and Bitsy Savior
  • Avatar by Room, Directional Avatar, Transparent Sprites, Opaque Tiles, Permanent Items, Dialog Choices, Dialog Jump, and Long Dialog hacks
